title.native: 真恋姫†無双 ～乙女繚乱☆三国志演義～

description:
Kanuu and Chouhi's group rescue a mysterious girl, who is actually the real Ryuubi, her name and heirloom sword stolen after the events of the last season. The group sets off to recover Ryuubi's sword. At the same time, a group of street performers, the three Chou Sisters, are given a mysterious magic book that may be more trouble than they think....The franchise re-imagines the classic Chinese historical novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms (Sangokushi) as a "moe (fiery), moe (preciously cute) action love comedy" with an almost all-female cast.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Ryouran Sangokushi Engi

title.native: 真恋姫†無双 ～乙女繚乱☆三国志演義～

node.description:
__Height:__ 161cm

[Profile](http://kenyu-office.com/okajimatae/) | [Blog 1](http://nekono29q.blog52.fc2.com/) | [Blog 2](http://soyoyo.blog81.fc2.com/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tae_Okajima) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%A1%E5%B6%8B%E5%A6%99)

She is a voice actress affiliated with Kenyu Office.

__Birth Name:__ Chiaki Takahashi (高橋千晶)
__Height:__ 160 cm

[Website](http://chiaking58.com) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/chiaking58) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/chiaki_takahashi.official)

Chiaki Takahashi is a freelance voice actress, narrator, singer and gravure idol. 
She is a member of the pop group Aice5 together with [Yui Horie](https://anilist.co/staff/95028/Horie-Yui) (leader), [Akemi Kanda](https://anilist.co/staff/95239/Kanda-Akemi), [Madoka Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/95593/Kimura-Madoka) and [Masumi Asano](https://anilist.co/staff/95077/Asano-Masumi).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Xinyan in Genshin Impact
- Tennant in Reverse: 1999

__Non-Anime Role:__   
Hatsuhime in "Yo-Jin-Bo" (Visual Novel)  (Visual Novel Game)  
Kan'u Unchou (Ai Sha)  in "Koihime Musou" (Visual Novel)   
Kan'u Unchou (Ai Sha)  in "Shin Koihime Musou" (Visual Novel)  
Kyaroru in "Everybody's Tennis" (VG)  
Sayaka Hozumi in "Yoake Mae Yori Ruri Iro Na" (Visual Novel)

[Ken Production profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/member.php?mem=w66)

A female Japanese seiyū primarily for visual novels & some erotic games/anime.

**Doujin Circle:** CLOSED/UNDERGROUND.  

She has been friend and has formed groups with Haruka Shimotsuki and Chata for a long time.  She started working in the fields as a vocal, net seiyuu, composer and lyricist when she first started high school. In 2004, she released the album "Min no Uta" as her major debut. In 2006, the ending theme to Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, "Why, or why not", marked her debut as an anime song artist.

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

[Website](http://5pb.jp/records/sp/asami/index.html) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/ubiquitous777/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/asamingosu)

Debuted as a voice actress in 1999 and as singer in 2009 by releasing her first single "Day by Day / Shining Blue Rain" under the 5pb. Records label. Currently working with Eri Kitamura in the music unit ARTERY VEIN.

**Non-Anime Roles:**

- Drake - Azur Lane (VG)
- Levia - Trillion: God of Destruction (VG)
- Noire / Black Heart - Hyperdimension Neptunia
- Otohana Sumire - Blue Archive

[Profile](http://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/697/) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/eriko_diary/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eriko_co_log) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eriko_Nakamura)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) currently affiliated with Arts Vision. Co-hosted the popular weekly radio show Odoroki Sentai Momonoki Five (おどろき戦隊モモノキファイブ) with fellow voice-actress [Hikasa Youko](https://anilist.co/staff/102263) from 2009 to 2017.

__Height:__ 158 cm

[Profile](https://web.archive.org/web/20210118181951/http://az-creative.com/agentoffice/profile/koyama_sahomi.html) | [Blog](http://meimisonoo.blog18.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mei_misonoo) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BE%A1%E8%8B%91%E7%94%9F%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4)

She is a voice actress better known under the stage name "Misonoo Mei" under which she is contracted to AG-Promotion and chiefly works as voice actress for adult games. According to her profile page of her recent "non-adult" media employer A-Z Creative, she has changed her "non-adult" stage name from "Chihiro Umehara (梅原千尋)" to "Sahomi Koyama".

BaseSon is one of the partner companies of Nexton, which specializes in the publishing and distribution of visual novel video games.  Past Works: Shin Koihime Musou -Otome Tairan- Shin Koihime Musou Koihime Musou Harukoi Otome 夕緋ノ向コウ側 屍姫と羊と嗤う月－cry for the moon－ One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e
